titles.title: Increasing American Jobs Through Greater United States Exports to Africa and Latin America Act of 2025
Increasing American Jobs Through Greater United States Exports to Africa and Latin America Act of 2025
A bill to increase United States jobs through greater United States exports to Africa and Latin America, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
